title: if dorans shield isnt buffed by the next patch
body:
riot should delete all top melees from the game .


its obvious you hate that playstyle and all the champs who arent ranged mage adc cockroaches.


so either fuck off or buff the goddamn item so i can handle jayce poking me everytime i go in for 1 cs .

make a thread about how its being looked at atleast.

SOMETHING.

adcs go vs ziggs and get outplayed and their bitchasses get a week of reddit posts and meddler talking about it.

this has been going on 3 seasons nwo and all you want to do is release skins and buff mages.

fuck me.
go into champ select just now asking for jayce ban and they dont ban him.

guess who i have to lane vs !!!! XdDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD

replies.body: Tryndamere well played can sustain through the Jayce with some caution

> [{quoted}](name=raynac,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TJuET4AG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-12T22:06:47.161+0000)
>
> Tryndamere well played can sustain through the Jayce with some caution

go play vs a d1 jayce and tell me how he can sustain when he cant even get any fury off not being able to touch 1 creep for 15 minutes

If i played against a diamond 1 the champ being jayce would have nothing to do with my loss seeing as he would be in the top 1% of players in the world and most of us will never reach that level of gameplay

What buffs to dorans shield do you believe are honestly going to slow down that monstrosity without making it overpowered for a starting item?

Edit : Watch some boxerpete! he could do it!
jayce is honestly just poke god, but i have a solution. be even more of a douche and play{{champion:78}}

> [{quoted}](name=Silencega,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TJuET4AG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-12T22:12:03.187+0000)
>
> jayce is honestly just poke god, but i have a solution. be even more of a douche and play{{champion:78}}

shes still braindead brokenbecause riot wont nerf her actual problems but will gut her ulti for some reason.

her ult wasnt the problem AT ALL.

amazing balance team doesnt even play the game.

> [{quoted}](name=McFatal,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TJuET4AG,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-01-12T22:13:26.158+0000)
>
> shes still braindead brokenbecause riot wont nerf her actual problems but will gut her ulti for some reason.
> 
> her ult wasnt the problem AT ALL.
> 
> amazing balance team doesnt even play the game.

http://imgur.com/a/zfkji

...I just starting playing Quinn.

I'm sorry. I still main melees top tho.
